description:
Dot followed a chicken that was crossing the road and now Dot is stuck in traffic!  
Help Dot get to the other side!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically say "Little help?" then automatically turn on red lights.
After turning on red lights, make Dot randomly choose to play a car horn or truck horn sound.

hints.description: Drag out two Vehicles sounds. Set one to Car Horn and the other to Truck Horn. Link the sounds with Random Link cues.

puzzles.description: After the car horn and truck horn sounds, make Dot wait for 1.5 s then play the short rocket boost sound. Then make Dot automatically play the siren sound.

hints.description: Link the Car Horn and Truck Horn sounds to the Short rocket boost sound using Wait For cues set to 1.5 s. Link the Short rocket boost sound to the Siren sound using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the siren sound, make Dot automatically turn the lights off. Then make Dot return to Start when the top button is pressed.
puzzles.introduction: If Dot gets into an accident, don't worry! We can revive Dot by pressing the top button.

hints.description: Link the Siren sound to the Lights Off state using an Auto cue. Link the Lights Off state to Start using a Top Button Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After each horn sound, make Dot play the spin out sound when Dot feels a slide left or a slide right.
puzzles.introduction: To avoid a crash, Dot should try to dodge the cars and trucks when the horn beeps!

hints.description: Link the Car Horn sound to the Spin out sound using Slide Left and Slide Right cues. Link the Truck Horn sound to the Spin out sound using Slide Left and Slide Right cues.

puzzles.description: After the Spin out sound, make Dot automatically turn the lights off, play the Nervous #1 sound, and turn on red lights.
PLAY WITH DOT: Help Dot cross the road. Try to dodge three vehicles.
puzzles.introduction: Let's help Dot get to the other side of the road!
